title: LF ADC/Support partner (Gold/Plat)
body:
I main support but can also play ADC. I finished seasons 4 and 5 at plat 2 but haven't had time to play league since and just did my promos (G5 currently). Climbing as support is a pain so would like a friend to jam some games with.

Notes:
-No flaming. I'm super serious, I don't care whose fault it was, the focus always has to be on getting better as a player. If you're not being constructive, shut up.  It's just a computer game, behave like an adult. Winning is nice but contrary to popular belief, this game is supposed to be fun. 
-Whilst it's a game for fun I would like to hit plat again this season, so I'm terribly sorry but if you're silver 3 or whatever it's probably not going to work. Happy to play a normal with you and see how it goes though. I do do coaching over at https://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=23482 if you want some tips :)
-My favourite supports are Thresh, Leona, Janna, Nami and Lulu, but if you ask nicely I can play them all, I just don't like them as much. 
-If you want to support me that works too :D Get ready for lots of Ashe and Vayne though... my champion pool is less diverse for ADC :P Mixing it up to keep it fresh works too (probably preferred honestly). 
-Don't play Ezreal. Seriously.... just don't. The Odd One says it better than I can. http://www.nerfplz.com/2011/12/theoddones-compiled-ezreal-quotes.html

Why do people post their IGNs in these sorts of posts? My name is RIGHT THERE. Message me in game if you're keen. But no salt. You're wasting my time and yours. And complaining, whining and anything remotely close counts :D
